parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

content.text:
Below is a website scrape and some contact details. Use it to customize an email reply to a prospect. Write in a short, succinct way. Use this template (filling in the variables with data from the site). Do not output anything except for the email copy.

Hi {{5.mappable_answers.`1b79c5b1-01b1-4683-8ca2-48ea9ccd4b79`}},

Thanks for reaching out. {whateverTheCompanyNameIs} looks greatâ€”love your {uniqueValueProp}.

I'm out of the office right now, but do you want to chat later today when I'm back? Happy to give you a ring. Just send over a couple of times (tomorrow works too).

Thanks,
Nick

---

Hi {{5.mappable_answers.`1b79c5b1-01b1-4683-8ca2-48ea9ccd4b79`}},

Thanks for filling out our intake form. We're looking forward to learning more about you & your businessâ€”one of our team members will get back to you shortly, so watch your email!

WorkflowLoop

mapper.subject: ðŸ‘‹ Nick from WorkflowLoop
mapper.text:
Hi {{5.mappable_answers.`1b79c5b1-01b1-4683-8ca2-48ea9ccd4b79`}},

Thanks for reaching out. Just out of the office right now, but do you want to chat later today when I'm back? Happy to give you a ring. 

If so, send me over a couple of times and I'll call you at {{5.mappable_answers.`ffd98604-cfc1-49c7-873a-3b8f35255b55`}} (tomorrow works too).

Thanks,
Nick
